data.name: Mystic Advent
data.detailed_description:
It is the midcycle of Generation 24XX. As a renowned mystic investigator, acting on intuition and perspective, sets out to assist her divinity guard associates in matters related to a planned attack she ultimately comes up short and late to arrival, with the guard leader spared only for as long as her arrival is due which in turn sets up a divine incursion that seemingly destroys her as the force of integrity is fused on position. But twenty years later across the metaphysical divide on I Alpha, a material analysis technician wakes up from visions of the incident and (believing it as just a nightmare) proceeds to simply cast if off and goes about his day... until the morning commute gives way to a traffic jam caused by the same investigative associate who now finds herself many existential worlds away from home as a result of the incident. Matters are further complicated by the day's workload essentially blowing up in his face, leaving behind a massive fissure upon which a perfect storm of events results in an overnight split of the entire residential district, transported and integrated upon the fields of VI Delta itself. But the problems upon the world of the investigator’s origin extend deep into other worlds, threatening to implode upon the very fabric of existence.

CLASSIC GAMEPLAY: Unload special elemental skills, slice 'em with evertything to swords and spears (and even handgun ammunition!) and exploit the weakness of your enemies to work on your advantage.
PERSONALITY MATTERS: No actions-say-everything leadership here - in this adventure, EVERYONE has a say in the mission to come.
UNEXPECTED PROVISIONS: From selfless intervention when it matters to unconventional responses from persons and creatures that you wouldn't normally expect it from, expect anything to drop without warning.
ADVENT SPECIALS: Turn the tide to your advantage by unloading special attacks which also boost the capabilities of your associates.
WORLDS OF DANGER: From Echo XXIV's subtropic utopia to Sigma XLII's frigid icecaps, other worlds in the metaphysic expanse begin to play into the divine strategy as the mission progresses.

data.short_description: Twenty years after the fall of divine guardianship, a perfect storm of events results in an overnight split of an entire residential district and into the midst of VI Delta itself. But the actions responsible for the situation extend far into existence, ultimately threatening all that is known.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.0.18362
  • Processor: 3.4GHz AMD Ryzen 7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 10 series or equivalent, minimum GTX1070 1GB spec
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
